title: 庆祝Minecraft PE0.12.3发布
author: 武王撞钟
txt_content:
MCPE0.12.3发布，修复了一些bug
总算能用新手机安安心心地玩生存了

replies.author: gebi老王
replies.txt_content: 0......貌似你经常玩 PE 老是 换手机发金锭那位  我记住的

replies.author: isaivin
replies.txt_content: 虽然我不玩手机版，但是你开心就好233

replies.author: .|°夨.忆ヽ
replies.txt_content: PC党路过~

replies.author: sinking
replies.txt_content: 楼主眼看你就要9级了 不发点金锭吗？

replies.author: ang_cheng
replies.txt_content:
我只是路过，看见金锭就进来回复一下
顺便庆祝一下

replies.author: 子弹～
replies.txt_content:
庆祝！！！！！！！
虽然我还是停留在0.11

replies.author: MC........
replies.txt_content: 只玩PC的路过

replies.author: VVV晓雪
replies.txt_content: 庆祝~不过我还是在玩0.12.1

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 增加鬼节皮肤不错（虽然一点都不可怕） ←话说发PE板块比较好吧

replies.author: dust_of_heart
replies.txt_content: 233，看到锭我就过来啦

replies.author: 冰冷の蛋糕
replies.txt_content: MC的未来一定会更加光明！！！

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 恭喜发布

replies.author: mine米
replies.txt_content: 您九级了~

replies.author: Orange_Heart
replies.txt_content: _(:з」∠)_根本不玩PE版

replies.author: DreamsDeductive
replies.txt_content: 看到熟人我就进来了（抢福利）

replies.author: maolongqi_jun
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
谢谢楼主金锭~然而我是PC党~

replies.author: 矿工zhanghua
replies.txt_content:
我没有手机伤不起
PE我觉的操作不太方便，也许是PC玩得多了

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
ios好像更新不了盗版...
无爱

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
然而我是PC党，不玩PE
还有你真的不是为了快升9级么[

replies.author: 风吟浅唱
replies.txt_content: 同喜同喜

replies.author: Anicca
replies.txt_content: 同乐 哈哈
我的金锭！

replies.author: 凯文丶
replies.txt_content: 手机版的真心难控制。而且一万种不熟悉

replies.author: jiand_jun~~~
replies.txt_content:
表示不玩PE
喜欢玩PC版。。。。

replies.author: 侑阳
replies.txt_content: 一会儿的功夫。

replies.author: 呵呵1232
replies.txt_content:
PE版终于是可以第三人称视角搞基了233~
第三人称可以看到蹲下的动画。

replies.author: 一起走
replies.txt_content: 哈哈   感觉手机很多地方比不上电脑的   还是热爱电脑版

replies.author: 纹笙乙
replies.txt_content: win10 PC路过
可是很难下到最新版

replies.author: One_Time
replies.txt_content: 对啊发点锭啊
